<< mat2str string type replace >>

newline

Returns a newline character.

Syntax

ch = newline()

Output argument

ch

a char: equivalent to char(10)

Description

newline returns a newline character.

Example

double(newline)

See also

double.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
